event_info_text: By adding a new event, I confirm that I have read and accept the rules of organizing events out of concern for health and respect for the other person. I confirm that I am over 18 years old.
event_no_interested: You're not interested in any event :(
event_no_take_part: You're not participating in any event :(
event_cancel_ask: Are you sure you want to cancel your participation in the event
event_no_participate_info: You will not attend the event
register_accept_policy_and_regulations: By registering, I confirm that I have read and accept the regulations and the privacy policy. I confirm that I am over 18 years old.
register_verification_description:
A message was sent to your e-mail address with information about setting up an account on the platform XXX. 

 To activate your account, add a 4-digit code.
settings_notifications_access_descriptio: Allow the application to send notifications of events and other services to your device.
settings_notifications_more_info:
Notifications are messages that are sent to your device to inform or remind you of an event or a new observation.

You can opt out of receiving notifications at any time.
settings_notifications_body: The application has been authorized to send notifications! Thank you!
settings_location_access_description: Allow the app to access precise device location information.
settings_location_more_info:
Location services is a setting on your phone or other mobile device.

Location services offer three setting options: Always, When using or Never.

After enabling the service, we have the ability to provide location functions, such as enabling location-related events to be published, or recommending events near you.

You can turn off location services at any time.

After disabling location services on your device, the app will not add new information about your location from this device.

The application also does not save your previous locations or share them with anyone
settings_delete_ask: Are you sure you want to delete account?
settings_delete_description:
Account deletion is immediate and irreversible.
Your data cannot be restored in the future.
settings_delete_ask_confirm: I want to delete my account
settings_delete_ask_cancel: I don't want to delete my account
log_out_ask: Are you sure you want to log out?
